posts.post_title: WTB  --  T206 Polar Bear backed cards
posts.post_content:
I am looking for the following T206 Polar Bear backed cards in PSA 3-5 or SGC 40-50 grades with no creasing if possible (I would consider PSA 2 or SGC 30 If they present nicely).  I would prefer to pay via PayPal (regular or friends and family), but can send a money order if desired.  Please PM me with any offers.

 
Crandall, Doc  (Cap)
Mattern, Al  
Milan, Clyde  

Thank you,
Andy
